title: Beautiful Creatures series by K. Garcia and M. Stohl (ePub Retai
description:
Kami Garcia is a teacher and reading specialist with an MA in education, and leads book groups for children and teenagers. She lives in Los Angeles, California, with her family.

Writing has got Margaret Stohl in and out of trouble since she was 15 (back then, mostly just in trouble.) She havs written everything from video games and video game manuals to live action screenplays, as well as poetry in the UK & the US. She lives in Santa Monica, CA, with her family.
